info.name: PMS
info.description: The **Project Management System (PMS)** module provides APIs for managing projects, tasks, issues, and related entities within an organization.

request.description:
## Register Project API

This endpoint allows users to register a new project in the system.

### HTTP Method

`POST`

### Endpoint

`domain:/pms/project/register`

request.description:

This endpoint retrieves detailed information of a specific project using its unique project ID.

**HTTP Method:** `GET`
